channel.title: Trading Problem
channel.description:
When I'm trading it cmes up varrock armour. How can i stop that happeneing. And when the press except they hve varrock armour in there invo. For example i'm tradin a guy 2bill full gilded armour. And it shows on trade vrrck armour and when he accepted trade he has vrrck armour in invo not 2bill of full gilded. Sme1 help me!!
Regards
Eliteseige :)
